blogs.title: Git and Github: a beginner's guide
blogs.description: Learn to track changes in your code with Git, collaborate with teams on GitHub, and master essential commands for efficient project management. Perfect for beginners!

blogs.description: Dive into CSS Flexbox for effortless layout design. Learn key properties for parent containers and child elements, enabling seamless alignment and responsive layouts.

blogs.title: Why does the console return undefined on executing the log method?
blogs.description: Unravel the mystery of why console.log() often returns  \"undefined \" in JavaScript. Understand function returns and their implications with clear examples.

blogs.title: Type Error vs Reference Error
blogs.description: Explore the differences between TypeError and ReferenceError in JavaScript, with examples clarifying their distinct behaviors and solutions. Understand common scenarios for each error type.
